mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, NAME, ID, PWD, EMAIL, NICK, TEL) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{nick}, #{tel});
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ID = #{id}, PWD = #{pwd}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICK = #{nick}, TEL = #{tel}, MODIFY_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
